name: FGS
short_description: FGS(Fair go Steel seal) is a pass for Fairgogame. To be simple, users need to exchange FGS(Fair go Steel seal) to join the Fairgogame project. There is no such thing on the market, and Fairgogame's future is unpredictable. The experiment could reshape or even completely demolish the world's view of blockchain. This is not an ICO project, nor is it an exchange. This is not a probability game, nor is it an investment opportunity. It is the ultimate experiment in psychology and economics, and it is as instructive as it is entertaining. This is our approach because the Fairgo Team understands that the best way to get blockchain to the masses is to show the value of blockchain to capital.
